snippet.title: Saturnalia – Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Available October 27th on PS4 & PS5, XBOX ONE & SERIES S | X, SWITCH and on PC (Win & macOS) on EPIC GAMES STORE! http://www.saturnaliagame.com/ A Survival Horror Adventure: play as a cast of characters exploring an isolated village haunted by an ancient ritual. Die, and watch the village reconfigure itself into a new form. Solve puzzles and open shortcuts to new areas with tools and items you find along the way, unlocking every piece of the story with different characters, each with its own power and suited for another aspect of exploration and investigation. SOUNDTRACK by Nicolò Sala: https://santaragione.bandcamp.com/album/saturnalia-original-soundtrack
